trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Martinsville
There were no other sightings in Martinsville on or around October 25th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I were coming home from having eaten dinner at Long John Silver's. We were one block away from our house [in suburb about one mile east of Hwy 37 to Indianapolis] when I saw a big light in the northern sky that appeared to be fairly close to the ground. I was just getting ready to say, "That looks like a UFO" when my husband said almost the same thing. We watched the light for a few seconds before a self-luminous "beam" came on surrounding the upper half of the ovalish light, the beam was in the shape of an old-fashioned nurse's cap, then, it just disappeared, not sure if it just turned its lights out and we couldn't see it due to gray cloud bank, or if it actually disappeared or went into the clouds. It was about 6:38pm when this occurred.
Summary: large amber oval light in northern sky, secondary lights appeared behind it before it disappeared
